text: The Bodyguard is a 1992 American musical romantic drama movie starring Whitney Houston and Kevin Costner. Although the movie got mixed reviews from movie critics, it did very well at the box office and it became a cult movie. == Plot == Houston stars as Rachel Marron, a very successful and popular singer who is the target of an assassin. Costner stars as her bodyguard, who she hired so that he protects her from the assassin. A romantic relationship develops between the two characters. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1992 romantic drama movies Category:1992 musical movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American musical movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies about interracial romance Category:Movies directed by Mick Jackson Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Cult movies Category:Whitney Houston
title: The Bodyguard
